description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for health check endpoints, including general health, readiness, and liveness probes, primarily for container or service health monitoring.

methods.name: GET /
methods.description: Performs a basic health check, including database connectivity, timestamp, uptime, and environment info, returning a JSON object with status.

methods.name: GET /ready
methods.description: Checks database readiness and responds with 'ready' or error status.

methods.name: GET /live
methods.description: Returns a simple 'alive' status indicating liveness.
